Text:
It's NEVER a good idea to pack mp3 files in rar. It makes it more tedious for people who don't need the entire torrent, and it does NOT save space at all because mp3 is already compressed enough.
Anyway, thanks for the upload. I was missing Deus Ex Machinae.

thx, great band, but few seeders :(
Gona seed to the end of earth!
dude nuke your .rar in the ass - note to torrent uploaders: don't .rar your music!!
